definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Xirun earth connections, such as copper body, with thickness, juice Eijun.
sentences.chinese: 土脈細潤，如銅體，有厚薄，汁水瑩潤。

sentences.english: After the juice is thus drawn out, the tree withers and dies.
sentences.chinese: 這些汁水被這樣抽出來之後，這棵樹就枯萎死亡了。

sentences.english: USDA prime has the most marbling and is the most tender and juicy.
sentences.chinese: 美國特優級牛肉擁有最多的脂肪和汁水，肉質最嫩。

sentences.english: Reduce again over high fire. Mix in some vinegar before you finish.
sentences.chinese: 前出鍋大火收幹汁水，再噴點醋拌勻，即可裝盆。

sentences.english: An alcoholic liquor distilled from wine fermented fruit juice.
sentences.chinese: 由葡萄發酵汁水蒸餾出來的一種烈酒。

sentences.english: Wine is made from the juice of freshly picked grapes.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒由採摘的新鮮葡萄的汁水釀造而成。

sentences.english: The great thing about juicing is, well, the juice.
sentences.chinese: 榨汁最美妙的，自然就是榨得的汁水啦。

sentences.english: Then we steamed the plums, strained the juices and prepared the jars.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們開始蒸李子，熬出汁水來，並準備果醬罐。

definition: umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
(of food etc) soft/pulpy/(Tw) (of a person) lacking drive/shiftless/lazy
